text: wzem alyhwd walnsara 'anahum 'abna' allah wahbawh, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: falay shay' yedhdhibkm bdhnwbkm? falaw kuntum ahbabh ma edhbkm, fallah la yuhibu 'iilaa man ataeh, waqul lhm: bal 'antum khlq mthl sayr bani adm, 'iin ahsntum jwzytm b'ihsankm khyra, wa'iin asatum jwzytm b'isa'tkm shrrana, fallah yaghfir liman ysha', wayueadhib man ysha', wahu malik almaliki, yusarrifh kama ysha', wa'iilayh almrje, fyhkm bayn ebadh, wyjazy kla bima ysthq
